mapper.select: select ID,USERID,COMPANYNAME,EMPTYPE, TO_CHAR(STARTDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as STARTDATE, TO_CHAR(ENDDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as ENDDATE, DUTY,WORKCOMMENTS,FILEID,WORKPOSITION from work_experience where userId = #{userId}
mapper.insert: insert into Work_Experience (ID,USERID,COMPANYNAME,EMPTYPE, STARTDATE,ENDDATE,DUTY, WORKCOMMENTS,FILEID,WORKPOSITION) values (#{id}, #{userId}, #{companyName}, #{empType}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{duty}, #{workComments}, #{fileId},#{workPosition})
mapper.update: update Work_Experience set companyName = #{companyName}, empType = #{empType}, startDate = #{startDate}, endDate = #{endDate}, duty = #{duty}, workComments = #{workComments}, fileId = #{fileId}, workPosition = #{workPosition} where USERID = #{userId} and id = #{id}
